page.title: 11Tredegar House
page.content: At{Tredegar House}there are the following facilities _ the house itself,the red pond and orangery,craft shops,donkey rides,a caravan park,a snack bar,boating,cafe,playing area and toilets. Four people who were interviewed came from Roathe in Cardiff. They all thought that it was a lovely place. They felt that it would be improved by adding peacocks,more flower gardens and by returning the childrens farm. Another person who was interviewed lived in Newport. He loved the area but thought that more wildlife could be added. The first group of people thought that there was need of a second car park, especially one for buses. They also felt that the caravan park was very short of basic amenities,e.g. showers.
